title: The history of love a poem in a letter to a lady / by Mr. Charles Hopkins.
author: Hopkins, Charles, 1664?-1700?
publisher: Printed by J. Dawks, for Jacob Tonson ...,
notes: "Several stories of Ovid's Metamorphoses translated into English verse": p. [85]-118.
Includes several poems in imitation of Ovid's "Metamorphoses."
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
